alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lamoille, northeastern Caledonia, Orleans, west central Essex and eastern Franklin Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Enosburg to Newport Center. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Enosburg Falls, Orleans, Johnson Village, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Eden, Westmore, Cambridge, Bakersfield, Orleans Village, Glover, Montgomery Center, Brownington, Albany, Hyde Park, Montgomery, Coventry, and Barton. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 150 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Franklin
